welcome_message_body: "Welcome to El Monte, Chile! Get ready to be enchanted by our charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that El Monte has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

restaurants.address: Av. Libertadores 1050, El Monte, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile
